metadata.title: CVE-2023-1108 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in undertow. This issue makes achieving a denial ofservice possible due to an unexpected handshake status updated inSslConduit, where the loop never terminates.

criterions.comment: undertow: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
